summary: Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Home Affairs  Bam Dev Gautam ’s chief advisor Pradeep Nepal has resigned from his post on Sunday. “I have resigned from the post of the chief advisor to DPM and Home Minister  Bam Dev Gautam ,” he wrote on his Facebook wall. Former Education Minister, Nepal was appointed to the post six months back. It has been learnt that he had stopped going to office expressing dissatisfaction with Home Minister Gautam.
title: nepal-resigns-as-dpm-gautams-chief-advisor
